EmailTemplate.description: when form is sent for Review
EmailTemplate.name: Sent for Review
EmailTemplate.subject: Sent for Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sent for Review
Dear {!AppraiseeName} ,
Your Appraisal Form is succesfully sent for Review to your Reviewer {!ReviewerName}. Kindly wait for the further details.
Thank & Regards,
KRIYA(PMS)
